channel.title: Matt Bird - Software Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content on Matt Bird - Software Portfolio

item.title: Capture The Flag AI
item.description: A team of AI able to efficently play a game of capture the flag against an enemy team.

item.title: Wave Function Collapse Demo
item.description: My implamentation of a the wave function collapse algorithm, able to generate random 2D game levels based on a pre-determined tile set.

item.title: Iskandar - Spear of Truth
item.description: An exploration/puzzle game created and published by me and a small group of junior programmers and designers.

item.title: Hypersomnia
item.description: An indie horror game created and published by me and a small team of junior programmers

item.title: Endless Terrain Generator
item.description: A Unity editor tool created to help developers design and implament endlessly generated terrain.
